articles.author: Sue Lannin
articles.title: Wall Street rallies after UK backflip on tax cuts and Bank of America's earnings rise - ABC News
articles.description: US stocks rallied overnight after the UK Government ditched major parts of its economic plan that caused turmoil in financial markets and the Bank of America posted stronger earnings.
articles.content:
Wall Street has surged after the UK reversed course on its mini budget, which had caused chaos in financial markets, and after strong Bank of America earnings drove a relief rally.
